resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105488</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105488</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tornado Safety Tips Brochure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tornado-Sicherheit Spitzt Broschüre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Sûreté De Tornade Incline La Brochure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Segurança Do Furacão Derruba O Folheto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Sicurezza Di Ciclone Capovolge L'Opuscolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυλλάδιο ακρών ασφάλειας ανεμοστροβίλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Seguridad Del Tornado Inclina El Folleto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site describes atmospheric conditions that cause tornadoes, how to prepare for tornadoes, and how to mitigate damage caused by them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site beschreibt atmosphärische Bedingungen,
die Tornados verursachen, wie man für Tornados vorbereitet und wie 
man die Beschädigung abschwächt, die durch sie verursacht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site décrit les conditions atmosphériques qui
causent des tornades, comment se préparer aux tornades, et comment 
atténuer des dommages provoqués par elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local descreve as circunstâncias 
atmosféricas que causam furacões, como preparar-se para furacões, e
como mitigate os danos causados por eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo descrive le circostanze atmosferiche 
che causano i cicloni, come prepararsi per i cicloni e come attenuare 
danni causati da loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιγράφει τις ατμοσφαιρικές συνθήκες 
ότι ανεμοστρόβιλοι αιτίας, πώς να προετοιμαστεί για τους 
ανεμοστροβίλους, και πώς να μετριάσει τη ζημία που προκαλείται 
από τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio describe las condiciones atmosféricas 
que causan tornados, cómo prepararse para los tornados, y cómo 
atenuar el daño causado por ellos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105488</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tornado-safety-tips-brochure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
